Title: A Night to Remember
Synopsis: A shell-shocked soldier’s return from war strains his marriage and identity, pushing him toward a desperate act.

Title: A Song to Remember
Synopsis: Chopin’s genius blossoms under political upheaval and a tempestuous romance with George Sand.

Synopsis: A young girl comes of age while her family fights to survive poverty and heartbreak in early Brooklyn.

Synopsis: Two Marines on leave stumble into danger and romance when they cross a nightclub singer with a secret.

Synopsis: Adventure-drama about frontier rivalry, murder, and redemption in the Alaskan wilderness.

Synopsis: WWII drama on command cowardice and moral conflict. *(Note: post-1945)*

Title: Bahama Passage
Synopsis: A foreman and his boss’s daughter clash and fall in love on a Caribbean island poised for unrest.

Title: Beachhead to Berlin
Synopsis: Documentary compiled from Allied combat footage chronicling amphibious assaults in the Pacific theater.

Synopsis: A junior doctor balances ambition and love while navigating loyalty inside a pressure-cooker hospital.

Title: Bluebeard
Synopsis: A Parisian painter hides a murderous secret as his portraits become graves for the women who inspire them.

Synopsis: Unverified title. Could not identify a pre-1946 film with this exact name; likely a misspelling or alternate title (e.g., 'Bombardier' 1943). Needs manual check.

Synopsis: A railroad scout and a gambler’s daughter find love and conflict as trains push west into hostile territory.

Synopsis: Soviet partisans fight Nazis in the forest where courage and sacrifice become daily ration.

Synopsis: Short subject (archival data scarce).
